thread.title: South32 Looks to Slash Costs as Commodities Fall
thread.title_full: South32 Looks to Slash Costs as Commodities Fall - WSJ

author: Robb M. Stewart
title: South32 Looks to Slash Costs as Commodities Fall
text:
MELBOURNE, Australia—South32 Ltd., the mining company spun out of BHP Billiton Ltd. earlier this year, said it aims to cut costs sharply this financial year as part of efforts to run a leaner business in the face of falling commodities prices.
South32 said Thursday it is completing a review of all “functional support” for the company that...
